== Ubuntu Avengers: Age of Unity ==

With Unity 8 coming to the desktop, it's time for a new Avengers campaign to provide rapid feedback to the development teams working on it. This page will provide links for filing bugs against those components.

=== Getting Started ===

You will need to install Unity 8 on a laptop or desktop with Intel graphics in order to test it. Temporary instructions for getting it configured and working around can be found on <nowiki>[[http://mhall119.com/2016/05/dogfooding-unity-8/|mhall119's blog]]</nowiki>.

=== Information How To Fill Bug ===
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Touch/Bugs|Touch Bugs]]</nowiki>
